title: Why the world needs another CMS
body:
Wait...what? Where's the directory I was just..? Oh, *shit*. I didn't. I couldn't have.... *Fuck. I did.* OK. Think. *Think*. How do you recover files deleted with `rm`? Maybe if that sector of the disk hasn't been overwritten, I can get back the SQLite DB...


Half an hour or so of googling and try different software yields no results. There *has* to be another way. L
